safetyTips: Socially distant delivery can be made - wine will be left on doorstep & bell rung to ensure safe receipt.
name: BRABOURNE WINE
address: Brabourne Vineyard, The Street, East Brabourne, Nr.Ashford, TN25 5LR
description: We're a boutique, family-run vineyard just outside Ashford in the small village of Brabourne. Currently we have just one wine on sale - a crisp, dry, still Rose, made purely from Pinot Noir grapes, perfect for a hot summer's day. During lock-down we're offering free delivery within ten miles of the vineyard.  Order via the website shop.
